name: ph-assignment-04-job-tracker-html_tailwind_js
description: Job Application Tracker project is based on a model page of Digital Employment Platforms. This web app is created on top of HTML, designed using Tailwind CSS through command line interface, and added with interactivity by the vanilla/plain JavaScript.

scripts.dev: tailwindcss -i ./src/twInput.css -o ./src/twOutput.css --watch 2>&1 | while IFS= read -r line; do echo "[$(date '+%I:%M:%S %p')] $line"; done
